casebody.data:
Annemarie Morrissey-Manter
v.
Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2016 James P. Sexton and Emily Graner Sexton, in support of the petition. Christopher L. Brigham and Christopher A. Klepps, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 510 , 142 A.3d 363 (2016), is denied.
